data.text: As part of our commitment to Safe Travels, we’re keeping all surfaces clean. We wipe down the cabin with hospital-grade disinfectants, then fog with EPA-registered treatments that keep surfaces bacteria and virus-free for 30 days. urls.title: How can I change or cancel my reservation? · Spirit Airlines Support
urls.description: Plans change – we understand – and that's why we offer several options on how to change or cancel a reservation, quickly and easily. Changes or cancellations made 60 days or more before your trip are free. visiting  My Trips, entering their name and confirmation number, then proceeding with the steps to change or cancel a flight clicking here to chat with us texting us at 48763 or using 855-728-3555 on WhatsApp direct messaging us on social media giving us a call at 855-728-3555 speaking to a Guest

urls.title: How can I check in and get my boarding pass? · Spirit Airlines Support
urls.description: Checking in online at Spirit.com is free, and it's the quickest way to check in for your flight and print your boarding pass. Check-in begins 24 hours before departure and ends an hour prior to departure. This is also a good time to buy a seat assignment or last minute bags – it will be less expensive online than at the airport. Bags purchased within 24 hours prior to departure will be charged at the online check-in rate, so buy bags early and save major moola. If you don’t check in online, our kiosks at

data.text: The quickest way to check in and print your boarding pass is online. Find out how here 👉 https://t.co/cjxnRBmqkM https://t.co/EPM6uydwHx

urls.title: How do I add seats to my reservation? · Spirit Airlines Support
urls.description: Simply go to the My Trips tab and follow the instructions to access your reservation. If you are accessing your reservation more than 24 hours prior to departure you can click the Add or Modify Seats link and complete the form. If you are accessing your reservation within 24 hours prior to departure (up to 1.5 hours prior to departure) you must purchase seats through online check-in process. urls.title: Assistive Devices · Spirit Airlines Support
urls.description: Does Spirit charge for assistive devices? Assistive devices/medication are free and do not count towards your baggage allowance as long as the following is met: It is packaged separately from regular baggage items Our agents will verify that the contents in your bag are only assistive device(s) If there are other items with your assistive device, you will be charged accordingly. Click here for our baggage prices Please carry your assistive device onboard with you – do not gate check these items, if

data.text: We’re proud to accommodate Guests’ special needs. Find more information on assistive devices here 👉 https://t.co/yakFVwOtE0 https://t.co/EyvyTGUOnz
Need to get there? With one-way fares starting at just $30, we've got you covered when it's time to go. Book by 12/31. Additional Terms Apply: https://t.co/PVmlmOeDsi https://t.co/VZTwR5HHJi

urls.title: Does Spirit offer U.S. Military discounts? · Spirit Airlines Support
urls.description: The best thing we can do for members of the U.S. military, is to keep their fares as low as possible. Understanding the special thanks the U.S. military members deserve, Spirit is proud to provide the following services: Free Bags For Active Duty U.S. Military For active duty military traveling on Spirit, we will provide two free checked bags and a free carry-on, in addition to the already free personal item. The U.S. military member should arrive early enough to have their bags checked at the counter,

data.text: As a thanks for their service, all active duty U.S. military 🇺🇸 can have their luggage fly free. Learn more here 👉 https://t.co/2h5jKiUSgD https://t.co/2qMjyNTGOO

urls.title: What are the size and weight limits for bags? · Spirit Airlines Support
urls.description: To keep ticket prices low for everyone, we charge for carry-ons and checked bags. We charge more for checked bags over 40 lbs. This is because the added weight requires more gas for the plane. One personal item that fits entirely in the smaller sizer box (like a purse, small backpack, etc.) is included with your ticket. Another personal item or anything larger like a standard carry-on or checked bag will need to be paid for. **For Military Bag policies please click here. Personal item: (e.g., purse, small

data.text: As a friendly reminder 😊,  personal items should be within 18" x 14" x 8". More info here 👉 https://t.co/3sMmdJl2uN https://t.co/rMJkqn3eHv

data.text: We're celebrating the return of our bright yellow planes in El Salvador! 🇸🇻 🎉 Flights from @FLLFlyer and @iah to San Salvador, El Salvador have resumed. Flights from @MCO will start on December 19th. ✈️ Get your #MoreGo to El Salvador here: https://t.co/fbkF7hnV7Z https://t.co/w5YeBYyDHB

Our commitment to Safe Travels means we’re committed to reducing touch points. Our Spirit app, self-bag tag, and self-bag drop help lower face-to-face interactions and get you to your gate faster. Learn more: https://t.co/qIIs3IfYRk https://t.co/75tRH8s4Le
We give great deals so you can have great deals of fun. 💛 Thanks for flying Spirit and for being #PlaneAwesome https://t.co/Oy0znAftJm
